title: Mountain Adventure
description: Experience the thrill of hiking through breathtaking mountain trails, perfect for nature enthusiasts and adventure seekers.

tourPlan.day1: Arrival and briefing, short evening hike to acclimatize.
tourPlan.day2: Full-day hike through forest trails, picnic lunch by a waterfall.
tourPlan.day3: Summit hike to the peak, panoramic views, return to base camp.

title: Wildlife Safari
description: Embark on an unforgettable wildlife safari and witness exotic animals in their natural habitat.

tourPlan.day1: Arrival and check-in, evening safari drive.
tourPlan.day2: Morning bird watching, afternoon elephant ride through the jungle.
tourPlan.day3: Full-day safari with packed lunch, evening campfire.

title: Sky High Adventures
description: Soar through the skies with our exhilarating air ride tours, including hot air balloon and helicopter rides.

tourPlan.day1: Arrival and safety briefing, evening hot air balloon ride.
tourPlan.day2: Helicopter tour over city landmarks, sunset glider ride.

title: Sports Extravaganza
description: Join us for an action-packed sports adventure, featuring a variety of exciting activities and competitions.

tourPlan.day1: Arrival and warm-up activities, afternoon team sports.
tourPlan.day2: Full-day sports competitions, evening award ceremony.

title: Riding Trails
description: Explore scenic trails on horseback with our guided riding tours, perfect for riders of all skill levels.

tourPlan.day1: Arrival and riding orientation, short trail ride.
tourPlan.day2: Full-day trail ride through diverse landscapes, picnic lunch.
tourPlan.day3: Morning ride to a scenic viewpoint, return to base camp.

title: Tropical Swim
description: Dive into crystal clear waters with our tropical swimming tours, perfect for relaxing and enjoying the sun.

tourPlan.day1: Arrival and beach orientation, afternoon swim and relax.
tourPlan.day2: Snorkeling trip to nearby reef, evening beach bonfire.
